page.title: 02BISHOPS CASTLE 2
page.content: Bishops Castle used to have a Railway line which ran from{Bishops Castle to{Craven Arms.}It opened in 1865 and closed in 1935 because it went bankrupt.It is a pity it is not open today because it would probably be the main tourists attraction.There are still a few remains of the tracks and station.Where the Railway used to stand there is now an Industrial estate. There is a place near the bottom of the town called the{Playing Fields}, where lots of people go.People go there to play on a see saw,a slide, a roundabout and some swings or you could just go for a walk.There is a football pitch where anyone is allowed to play.Opposite there are some climbing frames for little children. There is a log to climb on as well.
